sys_ui_message.key:
for those wishing to return to absa offices, you will be required to perform a self-screening survey.
more information on the self-screening procedure can be found [here](https://absahr.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=kb0012637).
sys_ui_message.message:
For those wishing to return to Absa offices, you will be required to perform a self-screening survey.
More information on the self-screening procedure can be found [here](https://absahr.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0012637).
